changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION add_word_to_learn_collection(p_word_and_learn_collection_owner_id BIGINT, p_word_id BIGINT, p_learn_collection_id BIGINT) RETURNS VOID AS $$ DECLARE BEGIN IF (SELECT check_if_owner_of_word(p_word_id, p_word_and_learn_collection_owner_id) AND (SELECT check_if_owner_of_learn_collection(p_learn_collection_id, p_word_and_learn_collection_owner_id))) THEN INSERT INTO t_word_in_learn_collection (learn_collection_id, word_id) VALUES (p_learn_collection_id, p_word_id); ELSE RAISE EXCEPTION 'Business logic exception. Access denied'; END IF; END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

rollback.sql: DROP FUNCTION add_word_to_learn_collection( BIGINT, BIGINT, BIGINT );
